title: Please Help
body: When i created my beta account (BATCatPRE) it was fine on my old computer i could switch between accounts by sing the beta home page in league itself or going to the legacy client. but as soon as i got my new computer it wouldnt let me go onto my old account (BatCatQ) so does anyone know if i can delete the beta account and keep my regular one or any other solutions?

replies.body: By Beta do you mean the actual Beta Client or the [**PBE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)? Also, which specific error are you seeing when you try logging in?

My previous comment was removed (which i understand why) but i would like to rewrite it. I cant get into my regular account as when i type in my username and password it logs me into the open beta account
When the client is released what happens to stuff i bought on the Open beta client
I also cant go into my regular account using the legacy client
I have purchased 20 dollars of rp on this account and im currently happy with this new account i would like to say no further steps need to be taken thanks for all the help
